metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0565 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: NaCl in 2015 allowed the CLFLUSH instruction, making rowhammer attacks possible.

notes.Note: alexmurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 19.10, the chromium-browser package is just a script that installs the Chromium snap seth-arnold> Marking this 'ignored'; Chromium's nacl may or may not still exist, but we'll trust Google to have handled this by now

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
